ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Embedded Software Engineer 
Embedded Software Engineer
Take your career to the next level working with some of the best and brightest in the field of automotive and robotics. Bring your ideas, creativity, and determination to make a difference in solving some of the worlds current challenges when it comes to the knowledge of innovative technology and the impact it will make in our future. If you think on your feet, can adapt, and be innovative, this is your chance to work for a fun and dynamic organisation. We are a global leader in digital control systems for the automotive and industrial sectors. Our products are combinations of software, mechatronics and electronics that can enable level 4/5 automation across a variety of industrial applications. Our people are at the heart of what we do, come join us!
Due to rapid business growth, we require the services of talented Embedded Software Engineers.
Key responsibilities for this role include:
Deliver highly reliable embedded software for automotive/military spec. hardware, including battery management systems, motor drivers, body control and communications modules;
Work in a professional cross-functional team environment to develop new products, from prototype through production;
Take ownership of your firmware products, including verification testing and writing documentation;
Follow the safety-critical software development process and write great software for safety critical systems.
Required Skills and Experience
A bachelor’s degree or equivalent in Electronics Engineering and/or Computer Science;
Proficient in C, C++, MATLAB, Simulink, automated code generation;
Minimum of 5 years experience in embedded software development in the automotive and/or robotics industries;
Programming experience with CAN and Ethernet bus communications;
Designing and programming functions for multi-core ARM processors;
Sound experience with the full software development lifecycle (SDLC) through requirements, design, implementation, testing and support;
Experience with ASPICE/CMMI, ISO26262 are mandatory and experience with ISO14229, IEC61508 are highly regarded;
Experience with AUTOSAR and embedded OS such as RTOS or VxWorks highly regarded;
Ability to be a key member of a high performing team;
Experience working in a fast-paced environment dealing with complex and multiple tasks;
Ability to analyse problems and come up with innovative solutions;
Ability to be adaptable and flexible to business needs;
Excellent communication and organisation skills;
Fluent written and verbal communication skills in English.
What is in it for you? It is a rare chance to be involved in something so unique with great reward and the opportunity to gain extraordinary experience working with an amazing team!

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Software Quality Engineer (ASPICE) 
Quality Engineer
Purpose of the job
You will proactively work with the Project and Product Management, Software Development and Software Testing teams to improve product and process quality.
Key responsibilities
Create and maintain quality plans and schedules that support the organisation’s quality goals.
Devise, plan, and conduct process quality checks, project and product quality gates.
Manage and regularly report on project schedule, compliance, deliverables, resources and risks.
Consult and guide designated business groups in their process improvement roadmaps.
Analyse technical requirements and design to implement and verify the corresponding process solutions.
Build, deploy, monitor and continuously improve engineering processes in a cross-functional team environment at an international level.
Facilitate and support internal and external quality assessment/audits.      
Required skills
The successful applicant should satisfy the following requirements:
BSc-level qualifications in Quality/Systems/Software/Electronics Engineering or a similar engineering discipline.
Proven experience of 5 years or more in the Automotive industry, or a closely related field.
Sound knowledge and experience managing, implementing and/or auditing/assessing A-SPICE or ISO26262 (other Automotive industry-relevant standards are a bonus).
Practical experience with writing/deploying work processes.
Practical experience with the full software development life cycle (SDLC). Experience with Agile and V-model is an advantage.
A strong team focus and highly developed communication skills.
Speak/Read/Write fluently in Hungarian and English.
Must have a great passion for doing things right the first time!
What can we give you in return?
A position at a successful global company in Hungary, where you’ll have to opportunity to learn from the best
Serious, professional challenges
Cutting-edge infrastructure
Flexible working hours
The opportunity to develop the vehicle control software of the future in the present
The opportunity to work abroad for several weeks (Melbourne, Australia)

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Functional Safety Engineer 
We are looking for a talented Functional Safety Engineer to join our growing team.
The candidate will report to our TBA (Engineering Manager – Integration & Test OR Software). You will work on the design, development, and integration of our world-class electric vehicle control systems.
As the Functional Safety engineering you will lead all activities relating to Functional Safety activities working closely with cross domain engineering teams, key program and customer stakeholders and certification/regulatory agencies.
You will be involved from a Functional Safety perspective in the Conceptual, Architectural, Design and Test phases of product development. The functional safety work products will be critical for certification for application deployment.
It will be important that you are able to articulate, coach and champion Functional Safety requirements and best practices throughout the organisation.
As the Functional Safety Engineer, you will be a key portal for information internally and externally relating to this subject.
Requirements:
A passionate interest in electric transport/mobility and an interest in developing new generations of electric mobility solutions.
A qualification in Electrical or Computer Systems Engineering.
Implementation of the requirements adhering to functional safety standard ISO 26262
Leading and coordination of creation of functional safety work products according to ISO 26262
Experience using safety analysis (HARA, FTA, HAZOP, FMEA) and tools (PLM).
Experience development of Functional Safety Concepts, Technical Safety Requirements and Technical Safety Concpets with relevant domain engineering teams.
Established safety validation plans with relevant test engineers.
Strong understanding of product development for automotive and ISO 26262, ASIL decomposition, safety mechanism.
Demonstrated execution experience in delivering functional safety projects.
Excellent understanding of the EV vehicle and its main core components
A strong analytical ability and being able to articulate the findings to keystake holders.
Great interpersonal and communication skills with an ability to articulate technical content,
Support of ISO 26262 TUV certification
Other Useful Experience:
Industry experience with IEC61508
Experience working closely with electrical and software engineering teams on safety critical systems with human interaction.
Strong written and oral communication skills.
Ability to mentor, coach and arbitrate with your engineering peers.
Industry experience in robotics, automotive or similar.
Experienced in product development within an A-Spice framework

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Beágyazott Szoftverfejlesztő Mérnök 
Keressük leendő kollégánkat, aki biztonságkritikus projektek beágyazott szoftverének fejlesztésével egy nemzetközi csapat tagjaként segítene nekünk a jó hírünk öregbítésében. Hogy minél hamarabb a csapat felelős és szakértő tagja lehess, mentorálással és képzésekkel támogatunk. Ha készen állsz arra, hogy egy világcég budapesti irodájában, home office lehetőséggel egy remek, segítőkész és elhivatott csapat tagjaként a maximumot nyújtsd, nálunk a helyed. Jelentkezz mielőbb!
Csapatunk tagjaként az alábbi feladatokban számítunk rád:
Nehézgépjárművekre szánt, sorozatgyártott termékeink platform szoftverének széleskörű fejlesztése lesz a te feladatod.
Vevői követelmények értelmezését, belső szoftverkövetelményekké való megfogalmazását, a szoftverarchitektúra és az érintett szoftvermodulok fejlesztését, a szoftver tesztelését, illetve a módosításaid dokumentálását fogod csinálni.
Képzésekkel és mentoring programmal segítünk megtanulni, hogy a feladataid szakértőjévé válhass, mert előbb-utóbb felelős leszel érte.
A projekt vezetőivel és fejlesztőivel való együttműködés szerves része lesz a mindennapjaidnak.
Mindezt csapatban, irodában vagy esetleg otthonról fogod elvégezni.
Te vagy az ideális jelölt, ha:
Ismered a C programnyelvet mikrokontrolleres környezetben. Minden nap használjuk, ez elkerülhetetlen – beágyazott C
Megbízható az angolnyelv-tudásod
Proaktív hozzáállásod – mert a szakmai kihívások nem oldják meg magukat.
Előnyt jelent, ha:
Tapasztalatod van az autóipari fejlesztésben
Ismered az AUTOSAR-t
Használsz verziókövető rendszereket
Jártas vagy az Unit, Integrációs tesztelésben
Ismersz Script nyelveket (Perl, Python)
...a fentiek nincsenek, de érdekelnek, akkor nálunk ezeket is megszerezheted!

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Embedded SW Engineer 
Our teams develop software solutions for automated parking and safety systems, processing various automotive sensor data and providing a robust, scalable output to driving function modules.
YOUR TASK
Our embedded component teams are responsible for various functionality of our perception and fusion stack. These state-of-the-art algorithms are required to run in resource constrained environments. Therefore, you will be responsible for:
> Implementation of a scalable, maintainable, cross-platform capable embedded software solution
> Optimization of neural network post-processing and sensor fusion algorithms for multiple hardware platforms
> Build and deployment of trained neural networks and sensor fusion algorithms into embedded environments
> Software documentation and verification by means of black-box and white-box testing
> Transformation of customer and project requirements into deep learning component designs
> Collaboration with our international agile teams
QUALIFICATIONS & EXPERIENCE
> University degree (BSc, MSc, PhD) in a technical area: Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or related
> Advanced programming skills in C++
> Basic programming skills in Python
> Good command of English language
> Collaborative, open-minded, team player attitude
NICE TO HAVE
> Work history in the automotive industry
> Experience in CI/CD configuration (Jenkins), and various build systems
> NoSQL database experiences
> Knowledge in Computer Vision, Image Processing or Machine Learning
WHAT WE OFFER
> Competitive compensation and a wide range of benefits, including:
> Bonus system
> Annual flexible benefit (Cafeteria)
> Private health insurance
> Employee discounts
> Sport pass support
> Flexible work-from-home arrangements during and after the COVID-19 pandemic
> Continuous development with access to numerous trainings, including technical skills, soft skills and language skills
> Personal career development and a challenging role with end-to-end responsibility
> Opportunity to see your ideas turn into reality with our test vehicles
> Ability to directly deliver software into real, innovative products
> Easily accessible office location in downtown Budapest (near Kálvin square)

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Change manager 
We are looking for a Change Manager in one of Europe’s biggest manufacturing centers, who will be responsible for the coordination and transformation activities, which are triggered by the ongoing implementation of a new ERP system.
As a Change Manager you will be responsible for...
Analysing the nature and the impact of the system change
Preparing the organisation for the upcoming changes beyond the implementation of the new system
Organising information shares and system onboarding
Creating communication plans and ensuring the transparency
Supporting team dynamics and motivation
Supporting the company's cultural evaluation with communicating, enablement and monitoring
Leading the improvement and transformation measures related to change management
What you will need to succeed?
Several years of experience in change management
Good communication skills
Proficiency in English both in written and spoken
Strong organisational skills
Experience in system related implementation projects such as ERP, MES, APS
It would be nice if you had...
Coaching background
Change manager experience in manufacturing background
Knowledge of agile software development technologies

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Voice Configuration Engineer 
Your new company
You’ll have delivery and planning responsibility regarding the German Domestic Voice Services. You will be a part of a small team building voice configuration for domestic customers. 
One part of the duty is the configuration regarding EWSD services, these are legacy voice configuration but also having opportunities to be involved into the VoIP service configuration. 
Your new role
Working standalone and in team as part of managed projects on incoming customer requests using defined processes for provisioning. Dealing with (create, cease, modify, validate) site and customer related configuration settings. 
You’ll build customer voice configurations and maintain existing VoIP setups. 
To be successful in this role, you must be a motivated and quick learner, possess strong technical problem-solving skills; and be someone who embraces challenges, constructively working together, sharing ideas and knowledge. 
Keeping up to date with the latest development of VoIP technologies, where related to Cisco and Juniper and willing to take the knowledge of products and processes within own product areas. 
You must provide the technical support for request fulfilment, delivery, troubleshooting and hyper care to the customer network service requests. As an assigned consultant for specific projects, you will need to validate (pre & post checks) the existing configurations, to create implementation plans/configurations, assist and notify the CDP team proactively, if there is any network related issue, or obstacle. Candidate is required to support request fulfilment in addition to project work, migrations. 
You need to guide and support our stakeholders (e.g. Project Managers, Technical Designers, Customer Delivery Team) to achieve performance, customer experience expectations and quality standards within budget. 
You will need to provide troubleshooting and consultancy to technical design team and project management. Identifying possible issues and recommending changes to improve reliability, performance of the service. Attending customer calls when appropriate. 
Providing support for other technical delivery team’s reported incidents, including troubleshooting, diagnostics and implementing resolution, also to maintain training of other junior and senior team members. 
What you'll need to succeed
Understanding of Voice technology (VoIP, knowledge of SIP protocol). 
Detailed knowledge of voice telecommunications environment. 
Hands-on knowledge for voice network design principals. Able to create voice design based on customer requirement and document the design properly in the given tools/systems. 
Having analytical approach to be able to fulfil the troubleshooting. 
Ideally an understanding of legacy voice services, Siemens EWSD. 
Fluent in English 
Ability to meet the customers’ needs in line with the business requirements. 
What you'll get in return
Inspiring new challenges and supportive, friendly team culture 
Employee and Family Friendly Workplace – Flexibility to work from Home in part time (Based on the laws HO only available from the territory of Hungary) 
Opportunity for professional development through programs, trainings 
Company mobile phone and company laptop 
What you need to do now
If you're interested in this role, click 'apply now' to forward an up-to-date copy of your CV, or call us now.
If this job isn't quite right for you but you are looking for a new position, please contact us for a confidential discussion on your career.

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Software Engineer Front-end 
Your new company:
 Because of the rapidly changing environment, our partner has set its aim to become the most data & technology-driven airline in the world. Changing their way of working, modernizing their technology stack and architecture and the right positioning of people is key to achieving this ambition. They have organized their product teams around business processes, where together business and IT are end-to-end responsible for the digital products and services that support our operation. They are looking for a software engineer specialist in Front-end, who together organize all necessary engineering tasks and help maximise the flow of value. As a software engineer, you will work shoulder to shoulder with other software engineers, like backend specialists, data scientists, domain experts, and frontline staff to shape the future of our partner and the aviation industry.
Your new role
As a Front-end specialist, you will apply your skills to change the way our partner works, driving innovation and transforming them into a truly data-driven organization. They value both technical expertise (analysis, design & architecture, engineering, quality assurance and DevSecOps) as well as the interpersonal parts of the job (coaching, consulting, coordination, and support). 
 As a software engineer Front-end, your key result areas are:
Make use of right technology and govern architecture for products in line with the organizational objectives, ensuring that the right technologies are chosen to strike an optimal balance between achieving business goals, realizing functional and technical requirements, and managing technical debt, development costs and continuity costs 
Design and implement the overall architecture aligned with other optimizers for the product to deliver
Translate business needs into compelling products and deliver them to end users so that business value is created 
Take care of specification, design, engineering, testing, delivery, maintenance, monitoring, and support of digital products
Foster a culture where state-of-the-art approaches, tooling and technologies are applied as fits with the mission of the department, the KPI’s and desired business impact
What you'll need to succeed
Preferably Bachelor degree or higher in Computer Science, Software Engineering or other relevant fields
Minimum of 5 years of professional experience with JavaScript / TypeScript, HTML, CSS and SASS
Minimum of 2 years of experience building enterprise production-grade Angular applications
Experience with consuming APIs and knowledge of REST API best practices
Knowledge of continuous integration/continuous deployment techniques and tools (Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, Bamboo)
Proficient with automated testing (e.g., Unit tests, End-2-End tests)
Experience with Bootstrap, tailwind or other CSS frameworks
Experience with bringing enterprise Front-end applications to production and supporting Front-enders in industrializing their code
Experience in coaching and knowledge sharing to familiarize teams with software engineering best practices
Knowledge with and experience in agile way of working (e.g., SAFe, Scrum, Agile)
Great communication skills, written and spoken (English) and team spirit 
This role requires participation in their on-call support rotation every six weeks
All their teams have a hybrid way of working, they do ask you to come to the office every so often to meet your colleagues, to participate in trainings or team events. 
 In addition, the following requirements are considered nice to have:
Experience with other frontend frameworks (e.g., React, Vue.js)
Experience with Node.js, NestJS and GraphQL.
Experience with state management like NGRX or Redux
Experience with UX design
What you'll get in return
They offer a dynamic and challenging position in the heart of their Operation department. The role provides opportunities to apply leading edge craftsmanship and enable impact across their organization. You will be working with talented, driven people within and outside your field, on cutting-edge technology and with top-level equipment. You will be part of the broader community at our partner that organizes lectures, information sessions, hackathons and more. They are an international European corporate looking to grow in Hungary. This means you will be able to rely on the resources of our Amsterdam HQ, and they will invite you every three months to the Netherlands for our quarterly planning events. In Hungary on the people side they are very new, being part of a growing new organization brings opportunities and they will help you to grow with them. They offer a clear career path with ample opportunity for growth. You will have a hierarchical and a functional manager, your functional manager will also have a software engineering background and therefore they will be able to truly help you develop both your soft and hard skills. In your further development you can choose to either grow into a Principal Engineer, or transition to an Engineering Leader (a partially managerial role). 
  Additionally, they offer: 
- A competitive salary depending on your level and experience
- 10% of your time set aside for personal learning and development
- An excellent pension scheme, profit sharing, and yearly bonus. 
- Substantial discounts on flight tickets (after 6 months of employment) 
- A travel allowance 
- Discount on health insurance 
- A learning budget
What you need to do now
If you're interested in this role, click 'apply now' to forward an up-to-date copy of your CV, or call us now.
If this job isn't quite right for you but you are looking for a new position, please contact us for a confidential discussion on your career.

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Senior DevOps Engineer (AWS) 
Your new company
In the IT Services area, they implement the best in class solutions in the Business 4.0 era to enable strong digital foundations for our customers worldwide. We are working with a wide range of technologies and programming languages. 
Your new role
Manage incidents on the core platform where other applications are running. Stability is key. 
Depending on the nature of problems, you propose and implement solutions in collaboration with other teams. 
You guide other teams so that they can be autonomous in the DevOps part of their applications.
Scope of applications, some examples:
>Orchestration and interfacing, including all object conversions, between a mathematical kernel and electrical vehicle charging stations, including the scheduling of processing tasks, monitoring, error handling, communication with other web services, communication with embedded devices
>Industrial IoT data collection system, with monitoring, alerting and dashboarding features.
>Industrialization end-to-end of an existing prototype, including a mathematical kernel and in collaboration with a math colleague, e.g., the estimation of the mechanical stress of a boiler based on historical data. 
What you'll need to succeed
AWS Cloud solution: AWS S3, CloudFront, EC2, EKS, KMS, EBS, EFS, RDS, SNS, SES, ELB, Route53 
Ansible, Kubernetes, Docker 
Redis, Kafka, MongoDB, InfluxDB, Elastic search, Nginx 
NewRelic, Fluentd, Vagrant 
Linux, Git, Gitlab, Gitlab CI
Nice to have:  
Knowledge of VirtualBox 
Experience with OAuth2, OpenIDConnect 
Knowledge of Python development is a plus 
Familiarity with PyCharm, Conda 
What you'll get in return
Delivering services from Hungary since 2001, making us a perfect choice if you’re looking for stability. 
We provide a wide range of benefits, including a market leading comprehensive private health care package. 
We offer extensive self-development opportunities: our colleagues have a multitude of training possibilities for personal and professional growth. 
There are both vertical and horizontal career options for those who like to challenge themselves and try out different areas and positions. 
You will be part of a global and diverse working environment with relaxation areas, terraces, and a friendly atmosphere. 
You can seize the day with us at our company events, hobby clubs, and sporting initiatives. 
An attractive compensation package. 
What you need to do now
If you're interested in this role, click 'apply now' to forward an up-to-date copy of your CV, or call us now.

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Test Engineer (Jira) 
Your new company
Tool-fejlesztő csapatunkba keresünk Test Engineer kollégát manuális- és automatizált tesztelési területre! A csapat új alapokra helyezte a JIRA-t, mint project management eszközt. Ehhez a szoftverhez fejlesztünk plugin-t a beérkező igények alapján. Csapaton belül nagy hangsúlyt helyezünk a kreatív problémamegoldásra, közös gondolkodásra a beérkező igények megvalósításának módjáról. Ha csatlakozol hozzánk, egy összetartó csapat részeseként felelnél a projekt tesztelési tevékenységeiért, ami magában foglalja a manuális és az automatizált tesztelési területeket is.

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Pozíció leírása / Job description
With key markets in the Netherlands, the UK, and the US, as well as growth markets in China, Brazil, and Iberia, our international partner supports one of the largest financial services groups, by offering IT, finance, risk, model validation, actuarial, audit, and asset management services.A diverse workforce and an inclusive culture are fostered by our partners. They value diversity as a whole, including but not limited to, racial, gender, and ability diversity as well as diversity in language, culture, beliefs, age, origin, background, perspectives, and experiences.
On a day-to-day basis, this position will perform responsibilities such as some or all the following:
Office 365 Security and Governance documentation
Tenant Security Design
Office 365 Security Design
Email Security Design
Power Platform Design
Implements and manages security and compliance controls within Microsoft 365 (M365).
Implements and manages information protection within M365 to adhere to corporate DLP (Data Loss Prevention) policies.
Working through PIA requests – OneTrust
Any requests that come from Security and Compliance Team
Security team does not have full access to Office 365 services and this responsibility would hold the permissions to run reports and work a long Security team during a SOC event.
Support forensic investigations
Detect, investigate, and take action on critical risks in your organization, including data theft, data leaks, and security policy violations.
Understanding the Retention\Deletion\Label policies
Work with BIGid Project Team to understand and align both teams roadmaps
Understanding the work being done in the Microsoft Defender
Own Microsoft 365/Office 365 documentation that sits in the BDR site
Update OneTrust Office 365 Services
PIA requests
Understanding E-Discovery
Help push cleanup of ShareFile dormant accounts
Manage - Service Now - Application IT Compliance Data for the Office 365 services
Assistance with Managing Risks related to Security and Compliance
                Elvárások / Requirements
Qualifications and Skills
Bachelor’s degree or equivalent knowledge in information technology or risk management/controls
Excellent communication skills in writing and communication information in a clear, concise manner.
Proven analytical, critical thinking and problem-solving skills 
Preferred Qualifications:
An understanding of Microsoft Security technologies
Candidates should possess a working knowledge of Office 365 Services including Microsoft Purview
Subject Matter Expertise in Security, Compliance, and Management including the compliance aspects of managed services.
Deep knowledge of compliance certifications (ISO, SOC, FedRAMP, HIPAA, DFARS)
Enhanced decision making and problem-solving skills.
Reliable level of interpersonal and communication skills and demonstrate a self-driven, proactive work ethic.
Capacity to stay committed to the task even during times of frequent change or information delays.
Four-year Computer Science or related degree or equivalent work experience.
Must be a self-starter and can work independently or as part of a team
Select, manage, and lead discussions with customers to ensure that compliance obligations are understood and achievable in the Office 365 Services
Provide subject matter expertise to business unit data privacy officers with the understanding of various compliance obligations, and working with them to develop roadmaps to achieve these compliance requirements.
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Competitive salary
Comprehensive health package
Brand new office at an excellent location
Hybrid working
Opportunities for growth and advancement
A highly people centric, positive and supportive work environment
O365 Privacy/Compliance Engineer

The following Challenges await You: Development of their cross-platform front-end application in Java and JavaScript running on different devices such as traditional lottery terminals in retailer shops, self-service terminals and mobile devices (tablet/mobile) running on different operating systems (Linux, Windows, Android);Architecture, design, implementation and testing in an agile environment (Scrum, Kanban, SAFe);Implementation of new architecture principles in the new software generation
                Elvárások / Requirements

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our client - provides innovative Cloud-based Contact Center solutions that empower companies to provide the best customer experience - is looking for a DevOps Manager. With their software, contact centers can handle a full spectrum of incoming and outgoing communications – through Phone, Email, SMS, Chat, and Social Media.
As an operative leader you will be responsible for:
Creating an annual strategy for the department and approving it with management.Defining goals for the implementation of the strategy, elaborating a quarterly action plan, implementing, communicating, and reporting on them.Develop, implement and continuously report action plans to the management to achieve the resulting metrics and KPIs.Establishment of the operational framework and processes related to the department (task management, used tools, priorities).Growing and leading a team of 8 Systems / DevOps Engineers.Develop recruitment, onboarding, training, and mentor system for positions, related to the department in line with the company expectations and systems.Continuous monitoring and measurement of the work of colleagues under your responsibility, ensuring their professional and personal development, giving regular feedback.Liaison with external partners (e.g. hosting), escalation, preparation of draft contracts.
As a technical leader you will be responsible for:
As the last escalation point of the department, you will be responsible for thevalidation, analysis, and development of the escalated cases.Active role in the elimination of critical errors.Ensure that the system meets current security requirements.Act as a project manager and product owner.Ensuring communication with stakeholders, follow-up case analyzes.Effective communication with key clients. 
                Elvárások / Requirements
They are looking for you, if :
You have strong experience in people management for at least 5 years, e.g. building and leading an operation/devops team (min. 3 people).You have experience developing new processes and managing the team’s work (e.g. feedback, coaching, cost planning).You have project management or product owner experience in infrastructure-related development.You have SYS / OPS / DEVOPS past, especially in the Linux environments.Experienced with diversified technologies in private or public cloud solutions (AWS, GCP, Azure, etc.).You have worked with wide experience in analyzing and implementing the infrastructure as a code (Ansible, Puppet, Docker) environment.Experience in telecommunication systems is an advantage.You have an excellent analytical and systems approach, and outstanding problem-solving ability.You are continuously improving yourself, and have a helpful attitude.Conversational level English (both written and spoken)Fluent/Native Hungarian 
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Our client commits to investing in your personal growth in the long run (attractive salary package, benefits, and career opportunities). 
The opportunity to work at a financially stable, growing company with a strong international presence and market positions in Europe, America, and East Asia. 
A healthy work-life balance with flexible work options. 
A company with regular team building, sports events, charity programs, and fun events.
Mentorship and training opportunities from the start. We create your career path together to help you reach your maximum potential. 
Internal training sessions, school programs, language courses, as well as the chance to travel the world to meet end-users and clients at conferences and meetings.

Our international client is looking for a motivated and dynamic Senior Devops Engineer to join their team.
Our partner is a strategic supplier to all restaurants, deploying in over 120 countries and over 37,500 locations worldwide. They provide software development, testing, deployment and support services for POS (point-of-sale) and related software applications that focus on the overall crew and customer experience, resulting in improved operations in the restaurants.
Support the quality of deliveries and product maintenance:
• Design and maintain technical solutions• Identify technical debts and opportunities for technical improvement• Ensure that the defined technical solution is being followed• Accept stories at DoR, and deploy stories at DoD• Act as technical liaison across the squad, solving problems on a daily basis• Enforce best practices in the software development lifecycle• Creates documentation and development guidelines
Day to day activities (this is what we use, knowledge on similar technologies are fine)• Maintain Jenkins pipelines• Maintain Kubernetes clusters• Infrastructure as code (terraform, helm, groovy or similar)• Work with AWS services and help developers• Monitoring tools (Grafana, Prometheus, New Relic)
                Elvárások / Requirements

5+ years of experience in the design, coding and implementation of complex IT systems
Experience with Agile methodologies - SCRUM or KANBAN
Advanced English skills (verbal and written)
Experience in AWS architecture and systems
Experience in Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery systems and tools
Demonstrated ability to adapt to new technologies and learn quickly
Hands on development experience or full understanding of development pipeline and process
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Pozíció leírása / Job description
With key markets in the Netherlands, the UK, and the US, as well as growth markets in China, Brazil, and Iberia, our international partner supports one of the largest financial services groups, by offering IT, finance, risk, model validation, actuarial, audit, and asset management services.
A diverse workforce and an inclusive culture are fostered by our partners. They value diversity as a whole, including but not limited to, racial, gender, and ability diversity as well as diversity in language, culture, beliefs, age, origin, background, perspectives, and experiences.
Job Description Summary:
As a Cloud DevOps Engineer, you will work on an agile team with developers from internal business units to deliver business value and outcomes. You will help to develop, test, and implement infrastructure code to assist the team in achieving their goals. Work will be done start to finish by an intact cross-functional team using an agile methodology,and employing the assistance of a scrum master, product owner, and agile coach. Each member of the team brings unique technical skills and strives to cross train to gain additional technical knowledge across multiple disciplines in an exciting and dynamic work environment.
What You Will Do:
Develop, Deploy and Support Cloud Infrastructure, as code artifacts or modules Install and Maintain Cloud infrastructure and applications
Support and deliver using Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery pipelines
Support resiliency and scalability using AWS and other cloud platforms
Enable systems with automated monitoring and alerting
Support the Team and Customers with day-to-day requests, Change and Incident tickets
Support Technology stack refresh on Systems (end-to-end) when required
Ensure automated security is built into each technology stack
Understand and respond to emerging requirements and ambiguous technology decisions
                Elvárások / Requirements
What You Will Need:
Qualifications
Four-year Computer Science or related degree, or equivalent work experience
Experience in supporting enterprise-level platform installations
Experience working with cloud providers (Azure/ AWS, etc..)
Experience with Agile development and planning methodologies
Experience in performance monitoring, alerting and troubleshooting in an enterprise
Understanding of the internet and hosting from the network layer up through the application layer
Preferred
Experience working in roles with a focus on security, including automated alerting and response
An understanding of API’s and API Security
An understanding of automated code testing
Certifications in relevant technologies, methods, or platforms
Demonstrate the key critical behaviors of commitment to task, communication, customer focus, decision making/problem solving,  tolerance of ambiguity, planning, prioritizing, and goal setting
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Compensation:
Competitive salary
Comprehensive health package
 Brand new office at an excellent location
 Hybrid working
Opportunities for growth and advancement
 A highly people centric, positive and supportive work environment

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our partner company is a leading Swiss software engineering firm specializing in the design, implementation and integration of large-scale business and security software solutions. Renowned Swiss and German customers from various industries and the public sector rely on their services and products. Their development center in Budapest is continuously growing so they are looking for new experts for our ongoing and brand new projects.
In your daily work you will:
create a new app from scratch
design, develop, maintain features that meets high quality standards
provide unit tests to verify your implementation
maintain and improve code quality (especially through code reviews)
investigate, analyze, and fix incidents and performance issues from production
collaborate with the customer and project leadership in Switzerland
create demos and present to clients
give and receive constructive feedback 
work in a hybrid working model
                Elvárások / Requirements
5+ years of iOS development experience
a solid knowledge of iOS native frameworks, tools, and development techniques like (Swift 5, ReSwift, RxSwift, Alamofire, Firebase, Socket.IO)
knowledge of SwiftUI design principles, patterns, and best practices is a plus
familiarity with RESTful APIs
excellent communication skills in English (spoken and written)
a university degree (MSc/BSc)
Nice to have
experience in working in distributed teams
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Continuous personal development and learning:diverse, challenging tasks, a large variety of projects, both in terms of industry and technologydedicated managerial support, helpful colleagues, supportive work culturecareer path: further develop your skills in your areas of expertise, or try yourself out in other parallel fields: project or people management, learning new technologiesinternal and external education, online and offline trainings (technical, soft skill, leadership), conferences
Great team spirit:amazing social environment with friendly, smart and helpful colleaguescompany sponsored events (project and company dinners, parties, long weekend in summer)international atmosphere, collaboration with colleagues in Switzerland and Portugal
Flexible working hours
People care:state-of-the-art workspace (small offices, height adjustable desks)fresh fruit daily in the office, free coffeebreakout area with csocsó, xbox, fishpongprivate health insurance from Medicoveron-site massage therapist

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our partner is working to take the quality of passenger experience to a new level. We are looking for an experienced professional to join their team in Budapest. As team leader, you will be responsible for managing the Server and Network Management team. 
The team's responsibilities include the deployment and operation of the overall infrastructure of our client, including the 24/7 high-availability campus data network, radio, voice and other communication systems, storage and virtualization server farms, cloud-based IaaS systems, and other IT systems. During the operation, Level 2 and - in the case of some systems -, Level 3 services are provided by the team.
Responsibilities:
Manage the group including assignment and prioritization of workload, performance reviews.
You will be responsible for the preventive and reactive maintenance of the systems, in line with the Incident management, Problem management and Change management processes.
Liaise with the Solution Architect team leader and the Business Application Management team leader.
Develop and maintain the group's professional business relationships with IT suppliers and service providers.
Monitoring the performance of the members within your team, and supporting them with a professional attitude in-line with our leadership culture.
                Elvárások / Requirements
5+ years overall experience including 1-3 years of experience in a similar team leader position. 
An in-depth understanding of high availability, disaster recovery, multi-site architecture, data center design, virtualization & containerization, network technology is a must.
Candidates must demonstrate the ability to learn on-the-fly, and be able to solve complex problems.
Very good command of English (written and spoken) and native Hungarian (must have)
B category driving licence
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
You will have the opportunity to be a part of and manage a highly skilled team of professionals.
You will be involved in the implementation and operation of unique and complex IT systems.
You will be part of the management team.
A vibrant, fast moving work environment.
Home office opportunity.
Server and Network Management team leader

As an internationally positioned IT team, we support the Client's product development by providing applications and solutions for mechanical and software development and for the management of development data. In this processes, we count more than 6,000 users among our internal customers.
We operate in a very heterogeneous environment of applications, such as CATIA Mechanical Design, MS Project Server, JIRA, GIT Software Management, Doors NG Requirements Management and our PLM system CIM Database.
To strengthen our team we are looking for a qualified and motivated IT specialist at our location in Budapest.
We offer an exciting work environment in a globally operating enterprise with many various opportunities for your own personal professional growth.
Focus is the software technical implementation of requirements demanded by our business partners in the engineering departments, mainly in Python programming language and in the context of our PLM System CIM Database
Developments of add-ons and interfaces to automate and optimize business processes.
Configuration of the engineering applications according to the business needs.
Operation, installation, configuration and incident handling in the environment of engineering applications.
Monitoring the service quality and ensuring optimal quality and availability of the application environment.
Communication and close collaboration with our other IT technical teams

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our international Australian partner is focused on the future of mobility on the field of autonomous and electric vehicles. They are looking for an experienced Senior Software Developer to join to their growing team. 
- Being an experienced senior member in a software team developing safety-critical and mobility-focused embedded software- Design new algorithms and develop adaptions to existing algorithms for vehicle motion control, user interfaces, actuator and energy management with the software development team- Manage implementation of systems tests, debugging and diagnostics and analyse resulting data- Plan, design, and optimize automated test cases and CI/CD pipelines with the software test team- Participate in design and code reviews within our software development lifecycle- Generate and analyze requirements and specifications from stakeholders- Collaborate with other software engineers, electrical, mechanical, systems, and product teams to resolve issues
                Elvárások / Requirements
- An Engineering or Computer Science degree, or equivalent experience- A passionate interest in electric transport and an interest in developing new generations of electric vehicles- Proven experience in building and releasing production ECU or controller software packages in relevant engineering projects- Proficiency in embedded software development in C/C++, model-based development in Simulink- Proficiency with automotive or industrial communications such as CAN and Ethernet- Experience with the v-model automotive software development lifecycle- Experience with software functional safety implementations and optionally, ISO26262 certifications- Strong understanding of vehicle dynamics, control theory and sensors- Enjoy working in a fast-paced and growing global team environment- Ability to work independently with a strong team ethos- Capable of mentoring junior engineers in the software engineering domain- Minimum of 5 years of experience in software development in industry- Proficient in Hungarian and English
It's an advantage if you also have:- General knowledge of embedded electronics development and the ability to read schematic diagrams- Understanding of the standards of functional safety ISO26262, IEC61508 and/or ASIL- Technical experience related to electronic systems at a component, sub-system and system level- An ability to analyse test results, highlight abnormalities and present outcomes to an audience with a range of technical expertise- Cross functional knowledge across the disciplines of electronics, mechatronics, and software- Experienced with Microsoft Office suite- Strong interpersonal and communication skills
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
- Work at an exciting technology company within Hungary delivering globally in a multi-national group- Enjoy a clear sense of ownership in your field, with the satisfaction of working on developments that create the future of a new category of autonomous vehicles- Work alongside a friendly and passionate team on cutting edge technology- Have the opportunity to travel to other company offices including Australia and the UK- Enjoy modern office space and great work environment

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Flutter Developer --medior/senior 
Country: Hungary (+36) • Budapest
Description:
Our client is looking for Flutter Developers (junior/medior/senior) for very interesting long-term projects.
Duties:
• Participation in the creation of the new, state of the art systems user interface
• Creating new functionalities of the financial systems
• Write clear, maintainable and testable code that you are proud of
• Running the mentorship within the Frontend team
Requirements and skills:
• Experience with Flutter (medior/senior)
• Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends and emerging technologies
• Proven working experience in team software development
• Experience with third-party libraries and APIs
• Solid understanding of the full mobile development lifecycle including automated testing and building
• Good command of English: ability to communicate effectively in writing and verbally (international team)
• Be proficient in using version control and continuous integration, with tools such Git and Jenkins
• Experience working in an matrix development process
Command of languages:
Good command of English
Client company profile:
Our client is a market leader and internationally acknowledged company with a stable background. They offer modern workplace with high-tech development environment with the latest hardware devices which available on the market, and wide range of technology sources.
What our client offers:
• Generous employee benefits, competitive salary (base + bonus + cafeteria)
• Flexible working hours, home office days (4 days/week)
• Personal and professional development opportunities (UDEMI / O'Reilly subscription, etc.)
•High performance equipment (MAC or Linux)
• Access to cutting edge solutions, newest technologies
• Start-up like work environment within a stable, long-established company.
• New project (Open source software application, replacement of legacy systems into future-proof modular architecture and creating systems with huge transaction numbers in a distributed architecture. )
• Work- life balance
• Flexible working hours with core time
• Opportunity to learn and gain experience in Flutter programming language
Further information:
By submitting an application form or sending your curriculum vitae electronically, you will be giving the employees of PBS International Ltd. the approval and acknowledgement to access, handle and record the personal details you have submitted for application and registration processing. During the course of your application and in the future event that a prospective party expresses professional interest in you, we will only forward your details onto our clients upon your exclusive and prior approval. For a more detailed view of our data security terms and to accept all of our terms and conditions please visit the link here: https://www.pbs-job.hu/?/data-protection/for-employees

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Medior JAVA fejlesztő 
Medior Java Programozó
Ügyviteli, számviteli, információs, e-learning, projekt követő, vállalatirányítási rendszerek egyedi fejlesztésével, implementálásával foglalkozó partnerünkhöz keressük ügyes Medior Java programozónkat! Egyedi, testreszabott, cégekre szabott rendszerekkel foglalkozunk, nem „dobozos/szétkeretezett” termékekkel és rendszerekkel!
A feladat nagy rendszerek építésében való részvétel, valamint a senior kollégákkal történő szoros együttműködés.
Team képességek:
távmunkában szerzett tapasztalat (sokszor home officeban dolgozunk)
standupok, workshopok, technológiai konzultációk – Teams/JITSI
Slack/Zulip kultúra írásos kollaborációra
Napi részletes munkariport, feladatkövetés (Jira/Mantis/bugzilla stb.)
Technológiai ismeretek (ideálisan, csak hogy lásd, hogy miben és hogyan dolgozunk):
Operációs rendszerek: Windows, Linux/Unix
Programozási nyelvek: Java/J2EE
Technológiák: HTML, XML, JSP, JPA2, JSF, SOAP, Ajax, SQL
Fejlesztő eszközök: Eclipse, PLSQL Developer
Hardver ismeretek: PC, Intel server
Adatbázis ismeretek: Oracle (PLSQL), PostgreSQL (PL/PgSQL), MySql
Web: Wildfly, Apache
Egyéb eszközök: Apache Tomcat, Apache webserver, Glassfish, Hibernate, Subversion, git, Yii, Maven/Jenkins
Irodai alkalmazások:    OpenOffice, Microsoft Office (Microsoft Project)
Ha néhány információt még szeretnél meg tudni, szeretnél minket és az állást megismerni vagy szeretnél jelentkezni, hogy együtt dolgozzunk tovább, akkor küldj nekünk egy önéletrajzot az allas@megbizhatomunkatarsak.hu e-mail címre! A z e-mail tárgyának add meg majd kérlek: JAVA medior
E-mailben IT pozíciók esetén elküldheted nekünk a linkedin profilodat is és mi már keresünk is téged a részletekkel!

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our partner is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. With its comprehensive technology portfolio, the company offers integrated solutions for established vehicle manufacturers, mobility providers and start-up companies in the fields of transportation and mobility.
The following challenges await our new Software Test Engineer:
Execution of tests using HIL (Hardware-In-the-Loop) simulators in the field of conventional and hybrid truck transmissions
Manual and automated evaluation of measurements (using Vector tools such as CANape, CANalyzer; FAMOS)
Development and execution of automated tests
Documentation and presentation of test results
Improvement of tests and testing strategies
Collaboration in an international team
                Elvárások / Requirements
The requirements you should fulfill:
University/College degree in Vehicle Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mechatronics, Mechanical Engineering, or Computer Science
Good command of English and/or German, both written and spoken
Basic knowledge/understanding of coding, scripting, programming (Python, C, C#, C++ or other)
It's an advantage if you also have:
Experience in automotive function or system development
User-level knowledge of Matlab / Simulink, Vector tools (CANalyzer, CANape development tools)
Category C driving license
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
What our partner offers:
Participation in international projects and missions abroad
Training programs and language courses opportunities
Excellent workplace atmosphere and attractive working environment
Competitive salary, performance-related bonus and cafeteria
Different sports options
School start support

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our partner company is a leading Swiss software engineering firm specializing in the design, implementation and integration of large-scale business and security software solutions. Renowned Swiss and German customers from various industries and the public sector rely on their services and products. Their development center in Budapest is continuously growing so they are looking for new experts for our ongoing and brand new projects.
In your daily work, you will
develop effective solutions for complex business problems in various industries
integrate new components and technologies into existing software systems and architectures
you will design responsive front end applications
participate in important project milestones; like estimation, releases, elaboration, etc.
maintain and improve code quality (especially through code reviews)
give and receive constructive feedback
                Elvárások / Requirements
confident knowledge of front-end development (Javascript, React / Angular)
good communication skills in English (spoken and written)
a university degree (MSc/BSc)
Nice to have
familiarity with relational databases
experience in working in distributed teams
Confident knowledge of OOP (Java is a plus)
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Continuous personal development and learning:diverse, challenging tasks, a large variety of projects, both in terms of industry and technologydedicated managerial support, helpful colleagues, supportive work culturecareer path: further develop your skills in your areas of expertise, or try yourself out in other parallel fields: project or people management, learning new technologiesinternal and external education, online and offline trainings (technical, soft skill, leadership), conferences
Great team spirit:amazing social environment with friendly, smart and helpful colleaguescompany sponsored events (project and company dinners, parties, long weekend in summer)international atmosphere, collaboration with colleagues in Switzerland and Portugal
Flexible working hours
People care:state-of-the-art workspace (small offices, height adjustable desks)fresh fruit daily in the office, free coffeebreakout area with csocsó, xbox, fishpongprivate health insurance from Medicoveron-site massage therapist

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Partnerünk egy 30 éves múltra visszatekintő magyar kereskedelmi vállalat, ami főleg a kultúra és a nyomtatott művészet világában lett elismert Magyarországon. Egész országra kiterjedő bolthálózattal és webshopokkal rendelkezik. A folyamatosan fejlődő cég jelenleg 20 fős IT részleggel dolgozik és egyre nagyobb az erőforrásigény. A naprakészség igénye miatt lehetőség van folyamatos fejlesztési projekteken részt venni.
 -Az informatikai hálózat működőképességének fenntartásán, javításán és karbantartásán dolgozz majd- Biztosítsd a (leginkább Linux-alapú) háttérrendszerek működésének folyamatos ellenőrzését és felügyeletét-Folyamatosan egyeztess a külső, kapcsolt rendszerek rendszergazdáival-Szakmai javaslatokat tegyél fejlesztésekre-Az alkalmazói rendszerek folyamatos működésének biztosításában is részt vegyél-Lehetőséget biztosítunk egyéb, belső tevékenységekben való részvételre
                Elvárások / Requirements
-Minimum középfokú (szakirányú) végzettség-Minimum 2-3 év( szakmai tapasztalat, és nem munkatapasztalat) rendszeradminisztrátori gyakorlat Linuxnagyvállalati kiszolgálói környezetben-Mély Linux Rendszeradminisztrátori kompetencia-Tájékozottság az informatikai szektor történéseiről/fejlesztéseiről-Angol olvasásban való megértése, angol nemzetközi szakmai anyagok olvasása a témában-Csapatmunka-Magabiztos, félreértéseket kizáró kommunikáció-Megbízhatóság, pontosság, proaktivitás, jó problémamegoldó képesség + felelősségteljes munkavégzés
Előny:
-Magas rendelkezésre állású rendszerek üzemeltetésében szerzett tapasztalat-Szkriptelési ismeretek-Magas szintű funkcionális felügyeleti (monitoring és adat/loggyűjtő) rendszer implementálása vagy abban valóaktív részvétel-JBOSS EAP alkalmazás szerver üzemeltetésében való jártasságHálózatspecifikus hibaelhárítás és felügyelet ellátásában szerzett tapasztalat-Git, GitLab ismeret-Találkoztál már virtuális szerverkörnyezettel (VMware, KVM) vagy dokkertechnológiával
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Izgalmas, sokszínű munkakör

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our client is a global software engineering and IT outsourcing services supplier, looking for a Junior Golang Developer. You’ll be part of a team of professionals who are ready to find the best tailor-made IT solutions for their multinational clients in various industries and solve complex problems. You’ll create high-quality software products that move digital marketing business forward. Our client believes in agile methods, quick hypothesis testing, and shining eyes. They need you, a Golang developer, to help them make all of their plans come to fruition!
Together with the mentor, a professional development plan will be developed specifically for you;
You will hone your skills in developing web applications and using modern frameworks;
Learn the intricacies of working in a team of responsive and professional colleagues;
You will improve your knowledge of English at an incredible pace;
You will have a chance to test your skills in a real project.
                Elvárások / Requirements
What our client expects from you
At least 1-year work experience in the IT sphere
Strong knowledge of Golang and understanding of the concurrency model of the language;
Excellent knowledge of HTTP protocol;
Experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and aspiration for perfection;
Good knowledge of SQL, experience with one of the relational databases;
skills in working with Git;
Strong technical English (conversational, written)
Will be a plus:
Experience with one of the frameworks Vue, React, Angular;
Experience with NoSQL;
Experience using Docker.
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Stable long-term work environment
Competitive salary with a flexible system of revisions
Benefits and social packages
Comfortable A+ office in Budapest 
Every necessary tool and device in the office will be provided to comfortably perform all project tasks: computers, meeting rooms, spacious modern kitchens with professional coffee machines, comfortable recreation areas with game consoles, board games, and a selection of literature for every taste
Paid English courses and conversation clubs
Opportunities for professional and personal growth
Mentoring program, internal and external professional training programs
Support and care from our partner's friendly team

pozícióba keressük csapatunk új tagját Váci telephelyünkre.

Jó szóbeli és írásbeli kommunikációs készséged van.
Kiváló a problémamegoldó képességed
Jó a stressztűrő és panaszkezelési képességed.
Képes vagy gyorsan döntéseket hozni.

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
RPA Business Analyst 
We are looking for a
RPA BUSINESS ANALYST
for our globally leading vehicle rental partner
 Identifying, planning, and implementing key projects to improve the process in aspects terms of Lean, standardize them as much as it is possible, make them prepared for robotic solutions and enable RPA developers with necessary documents
Responsible for targeting completion of process improvement projects within a specified time frame while achieving a cost reduction goal and improve the quality standards of given services.
Creating the – PDD (Process Description Document), the base for the solution’s development.
Leading the development of solutions that bring a positive impact to the Teams, always checking for scalability.
Actively lead project teams and provide individual contributions after key projects have been identified.
Liaison with finance and other members of the organization in assessing, tracking the financial benefit, and added value of all the initiatives

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Quantitative Researcher 
We are looking for a
QUANTITATIVE RESEARCHER
for our global energy business partner
Implement cross-commodity derivative valuation frameworks in company’s proprietary risk quantitative library, including new algorithms for stochastic process simulation, stochastic dynamical program solvers and calibration methodologies.
Provide technical advice to commercial and control functions on the representation, valuation and risk measurement of deals involving optionality and/or illiquid assets.
Employ modern software development practices for maintaining model correctness and performance.
Work closely with model users & developers to support and guide best practice for the mitigation of model risk within T&S.
Bachelor’s degree and preferably PhD or MSc degree in a quantitative subject area, (e.g. physics, mathematics, electrical engineering or mathematical finance).
C++ 17 or Python 3 programming languages.
Dependency modeling, including copulas, cointegration and local correlation approaches.
Pricing in illiquid, incomplete markets. To include utility function-based approaches.
Optimization, stochastic control, stochastic dynamical programming and numerical linear algebra.
Implementing advanced numerical algorithms.
Stochastic calculus, probability theory and Levy processes, and associated numerical methods for their practical implementation, including advanced Monte Carlo methods, transform techniques and PDEs. To include local and stochastic volatility, jump and regime-switching models.

Technológiai támogatót keresünk 
Rád váró kihívások:
üzemeltetett munkaállomások és a hozzájuk tartozó perifériák zavartalan működésének biztosítása,
támogatott informatikai eszközök költöztetése, szakszerű szétszerelése, üzembe helyezése,
végfelhasználók helyszíni informatikai támogatása,
helyszíni feladatok ellátása az ügyfél intézményeknél (eszköztelepítés, leszerelés, LAN hálózatok tervezése, kiépítése, LAN hibák feltárása és elhárítása, karbantartások elvégzése, IT eszközök imagelése, konfigurálása, telepítése, üzemeltetése, IT/TELCO eszközök hibáinak behatárolása, javítása),
helyszíni műszaki felmérések és hálózati mérések elvégzése, dokumentáció készítése,
incidenskezelési feladatok ellátása,
változáskezelés feladatainak ellátása (létesítés, megszüntetés, áthelyezés)
Csatlakozz hozzánk, ha:
informatikai végzettséggel rendelkezel,
legalább 2 év releváns szakmai tapasztalatod van,
B kategóriás jogosítványod és aktív vezetési tapasztalatod van,
telefonon és írásban is jól kommunikálsz, türelmes vagy, ügyfélbarát mentalitás jellemez.
Előnyt jelent számodra:
2 évnél nagyobb idevonatkozó tapasztalatod van,
alapszintű cisco hálózati eszköz konfigurálásában szerzett tapasztalattal rendelkezel,
Miért lehet vonzó számodra ez a lehetőség?
magasszintű minőségi szolgáltatást nyújtó csapat tagja leszel,
lehetőséget biztosítunk a további szakmai fejlődéshez,
nyári üdülés biztosítása a cég balatoni nyaralójában,
cafeteriás juttatásokban részesülsz,
családbarát hozzáállás
Jelentkezni önéletrajz csatolásával a "Jelentkezem" gombra kattintva tudsz.

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
TERMÉKFEJLESZTŐ MÉRNÖK KÖZPONTI VONÓ- ÉS ÜTKÖZŐ KÉSZÜLÉK ELEKTROMECHANIKAI TERÜLETÉRE 
A Knorr-Bremse Rail Systems Budapest hazánkban és a világon is vezető szerepet tölt be a vasúti fékrendszerek területén. A mi fékünket használja a körúti villamos és a csúcstechnológiás japán Shinkansen nagysebességű vasút is. Kiemelkedünk a magyarországi gépipari vállalatok közül azzal, hogy nálunk a teljes gyártási folyamat megtalálható, a fejlesztéstől a szoftveres vezérlésen át a megvalósításig. Tovább bővülünk! Jelenleg központi vonó-és ütköző készülékeket tervező csapatunkba keressük új termékfejlesztő munkatársunkat!
EZEK LESZNEK A FELADATAID
Komplex, új, a piaci és törvényi előírásoknak megfelelő termék, az autómata központi vonó- és ütköző készülék (kupplung) fejlesztése innovatív megoldásokat is figyelembe véve
Funkcionális és technológiai feltételeknek megfelelő kupplung komponensek tervezése különös tekintettel elektromechanikai modulok, komponensek pl. elektromos csatoló (E-coupler), kötődoboz, csatlakozók, kábelezés, fűtés, stb.
Gyártási dokumentáció elkészítése pl. műszaki rajzok, kapcsolási rajzok, stb.
Gyártás felfutás, sorozatgyártás támogatása
Minőségi és költségcélok támogatása, elérése
Eltérésengedélyek kiadása
Módosítások átvezetésének elkészítése
AMIK SZÜKSÉGESEK A FELADATAID ELLÁTÁSÁHOZ
Felsőfokú gépészmérnöki, villamosmérnöki, mechatronikai vagy egyéb szakirányú végzettség
CAD és PC-ismeretek
Tárgyalóképes angol nyelvtudás szóban és írásban

MIÉRT VÁLASSZ MINKET?
Nemzetközi és modern munkakörnyezettel várunk
Megismerhetsz innovatív termékeket, technológiákat és megoldásokat
Fontos számunkra egyéni szakmai fejlődésed, melyet képzésekkel is támogatunk
Az alapbér mellett széleskörű juttatási csomagban részesülsz
Minden munkatársunk után kiterjedt élet-és balesetbiztosítást kötünk, valamint részesülnek egy magán egészségbiztosítási csomagban is
Kellemes munkahelyi légkör és sokszínű programlehetőség (családi nap, sportnap) színesíti a mindennapokat
Saját konditermünk és sportegyesületünk is van, ahová örömmel várjuk új belépőinket

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Szoftvertesztelő mérnök 
Szeretnél egy profi szoftverfejlesztő csapat tagja lenni, szeretnéd a csapat által létrehozott rendszer indulását átélni? Érdekelnek a legkorszerűbb logisztikai- és termeléstámogató rendszerek?
Szoftverfejlesztő csapatunkhoz keressük SZOFTVERTESZTELŐ MÉRNÖK kollégánkat, aki a cégünk által fejlesztett rendszerek manuális és/vagy automatizált szimulációs környezetben történő tesztelését végzi.
Feladatok: 
teszttervek, lefutások elkészítése,
tesztesetek végrehajtása és dokumentálása,
hibák rögzítése a jegykezelő rendszerben,
együttműködés a fejlesztői csapattal,
fejlesztők által végzett javítások nyomon követése,
ügyfeleknél futó rendszerekben előállt hibaesetek analizálása és jegykezelő rendszerben rögzítése.
Elvárások:
Felsőfokú végzettség, vagy azzal egyenértékű szaktudás
Tesztelésben szerzett szakmai tapasztalat
Oracle adatbázis, illetve SQL nyelv ismerete
Mérnöki szemlélet
Kiváló analitikus és problémamegoldó készség
Jó kommunikációs és csapatmunkára való képesség
Határidők betartására való képesség
Angol vagy német nyelvtudás
Munkavégzés helye: Budapest XI. kerület, Gellérthegyen.
Fényképes önéletrajzokat a következő címre várjuk a "Jelentkezem" gombra kattintva

Projektmenedzser 
Cégünk Mesterséges Intelligenciára épülő parkolási, forgalom figyelő és biztonsági rendszereket tervez, fejleszt és telepít világszerte, melyekbe saját fejlesztésű videó analitikai- és rendszámfelismerő szoftvereinket építjük be. Világszerte aktív, kiemelt jelentőségű piacunk az Egyesült Államok...

További állások
2003-as alakulásunk óta működünk sikeresen a személyzeti tanácsadás piacán, több 1000 interjút tudunk magunk mögött, több 100 jelöltünk karrier álmainak megvalósítását mozdítottuk előre. Büszkék vagyunk, hogy sikereinket a családias hangulat megőrzése mellett értük el, ügyfeleink és jelöltjeink érdekeit mindig szem előtt tartva.

karriercéljaid szem előtt tartó tanácsadás
számos álláslehetőség
lehetőség valami új megismerésére

felkészítünk a sikeres pályázatra
szakértelmünket a kezedbe helyezzük
kellemes légkörben fogadunk

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Senior PowerBI Specialista (Győr) 
Legyünk együtt sikeresek!
Partnerünk nemzetközi tulajdonban lévő gyártó vállalat Győrben.
Nemzetközi csapatukba keresünk most kollégát, az alábbi pozícióba, angol nyelvtudással:
A leendő kolléga külföldi szervezetekkel fog együttműködni és a PowerBI segítségével elemzéseket, riportokat fog készíteni;
Dokumentálja az adatforrások tartalmát és az adatok közötti kapcsolatokat;
Meggyőződik arról, hogy megfelelő minőségű (=hiteles) adatokkal dolgozzon;
Globális data modelleket hoz létre a PowerBI rendszerben;
Online meetingeket szervez a külföldi kollégákkal: egyeztetnek az üzleti elemzésekkel kapcsolatban, hogy milyen riportokra/elemzésekre van szükség, ill. riportol nekik a folyamatban lévő projektekkel kapcsolatban.The registration No. of Hire-One Ltds. is this: 3376/2008.
Elvárások: Felsőfokú végzettség (gazdasági);
Aktív angol nyelvtudás;
PowerBI vagy egyéb BI + SQL + elemzési tapasztalat, ha lehet gyártó vállalatnál.
Amit nyújtunk: Korrekt, motiváló bérezés, cafeteria, bejárástámogatás;
Home office lehetősége;
Tréninglehetőség a pozícióban.
Előnyök: SAP rendszer ismerete.
Jelentkezem
Elmentem az állást
Senior PowerBI Specialista (Győr) 
Jelentkezem
Elmentem az állást
Hire-One Kft. 
Győr

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
CAD and Application Engineer 
Let’s be successful together!
Our multinational Partner is looking for an experienced colleague for the position below:
Receiving and transmitting the CAD files among internal and external partners;
Organizing prototyping builds, testing & CAD design iterations;
Designing and modeling of the new products, existing products and its test fixtures;
Draw 2D drawings according to the standards in place;
Realize and document the 3D models and the 2D drawings (with dimensioning and tolerancing) by keeping the requirements expressed and respect the deadlines by the requestor;
Manages the computer (workstation) equipped with CAD software;
Manages the CAD softwares, its licences in order to keep it up-to-date and working;
Know how to use CAD environments, receiving / transmitting CAD documents via different systems (Creo / Catia);
Support Technical Development Managers during the industrialization of the design;
Contact suppliers to clarify technical details, feasibility;
Support customer and program needs through customer and plant visits;
Establish and maintain positive customer relations, through analysis and resolutions of customer issues;
Communicate customer expectations and technological trends to group engineering, sales, and production plants;
Coordinate customer responses, relying on effective communication with Advanced Engineering, Sales, and the production plants;
New project handover to production and support also serial production;
Lead and Coordinate Change Management projects.The registration No. of Hire-One Ltds. is this: 3376/2008.
Elvárások: University degree in Mechanical or Automotive Engineering;
Knowledge of technical designing, sizing and tolerancing acc.to ISO standards (GD&T);
Knowledge of material forming techniques (stamping, bending, laser cutting);
CAD software knowledge of Creo and/or CATIA or Inventor;
Min. 3 years of experience in Automotive Industry (as CAD, product, process or project engineer);
Experience in project management and APQP, IATF16949; advanced PC skills;
Language skills: fluency in English.
Amit nyújtunk: Work in young motivated multinational team
Learn from experienced team members (in house and abroad)
Continuous developement through new projects and related technology
Opportunity to visit other plants in France, Germany, and North America for training
Opportunity to get all necessary trainings (professional and soft skill)
Competitive compensation package including SZÉP Card benefit support, and fitness ticket support
Előnyök: German language knowledge
Metallurgical knowledge
Knowledge in combustion engine and E-mobility  Strong Analytical, problem solving and inter-personal skills
Superior communication skills, self-starter, and results-orientated personality
Jelentkezem

Büszkék vagyunk, hogy sikereinket a családias hangulat megőrzése mellett értük el, ügyfeleink és jelöltjeink érdekeit mindig szem előtt tartva.

A GRP IT Recruitment Cloud Engineer CI/CD munkatársat keres Európa vezető pénzügyi csoportjába, innovatív banki és biztosítási szolgáltatások fejlesztésével.
Jelentkezz, ha teljesíted az alábbi követelményeket:
- Cloud Native alkalmazástervezés.
- Docker / Kubernetes / OpenShift.
- AWS: portál, CLI/API, EC2, VPC, IAM, EKS, ECR stb.
- Linux ismeret. 
- Script: Python, Golang.
- Infrastructure-as-code (IaC)
- Eszközök és alapelvek: Terraform, Ansible, Helm, CloudFormation.
- ALM csomag: Git (Bitbucket), Jira, Confluence.
- Folyékony angol szóban és írásban.
Amit a cég kínál:
- Hibrid munkavégzési lehetőség.
- Együttműködés nemzetközi szakmai vezetőkkel.
- Belső karrierút és vezető mentorok.
- Teljesítmény alapú bónusz.

A GRP IT Recruitment Functional Analyst-t (IAM) keres stratégiai partneréhez.
950,000-1,250,000 HUF Gross +Bonus + Cafatéira
Feladatok:
    - Identity and Access Management megoldás kivitelezése a koncepciótól a bevezetésig
    - Üzleti igények felmérése, funkcionális tervezés elvégzése, és funkcionális követelményekké alakítása.
    - A validálási tesztelés követelményeinek meghatározása
    - Alkalmanként külföldi üzleti utazások
Jelentkezz, ha teljesíted az alábbi követelményeket:
    - 5+ éves tapasztalat funkcionális elemzésben és műszaki megoldás validálásban.
    - Üzleti folyamatelemzésben, folyamattervezési modellezésben és követelménytervezésben szerzett tapasztalat.
    - Erős angol nyelvtudás (szóban és írásban egyaránt)
    - OneIdentity vagy hasonló IAM termékekkel kapcsolatos tapasztalat előny
    - Kiváló kommunikációs készség szóban és írásban
    - Funkcionális specifikációs dokumentumok elkészítésében szerzett tapasztalat informatikai projektekben
További információért keress minket az it@getwork.hu e-mail címen

GRP IT Recruitment is looking for a Functional analyst (IAM) for its strategic partner 
950,000-1,250,000 HUF Gross +Bonus + Cafatéira 
Your tasks:
-     IAM solution delivery from concept to rollout- Gathering business requirements, performing the functional design and turning it into functional requirements.- Prioritize requirements for validation testing -     Have occasional foreign business travel
Apply if you have:
- 5+ years of experience with functional analysis and technical solution validation.- Experience in business process analysis, process design modelling and requirements engineering.- Strong English skills (both oral and written)- Experience with OneIdentity or any similar IAM products- Superior communication skills verbally and in writing- Experience in creating functional specification documents in IT projects
If you require any further information, feel free to contact us.
it@getwork.hu

A GRP Telekommunikációs partnere csapatába Senior Software Test Engineer-t keres az alábbi pozícióba. 
(950,000 - 1,350,000 HUF Bruttó + Bónusz + Cafetéria)
Aktív angol nyelvismeret írásban és szóban egyaránt.
Aktív resztével automatizált tesztelés, validálásában, a termék teljes életciklusát végig követve az élesítésig.
Technológiai környezet:
- Minimum 4 év tesztautomatizálás területen szerzett tapasztalat- Microsoft technologies (Windows infrastructure, IIS)- Database (SQL/MSSQL)- (C#/.NET)- Visual Studio- Atlassian JIRA/Confluence- JMeter (SmartMeter)- Selenium- NUnitAz interjúk/kiválasztási folyamat nem igényel személyes találkozót.Képzési lehetőségek, előre lépési lehetőség

AMIRE NÁLUNK SZÁMÍTHATSZ
karriercéljaid szem előtt tartó tanácsadás
számos álláslehetőség
lehetőség valami új megismerésére
AMIT MI NYÚJTUNK
felkészítünk a sikeres pályázatra
szakértelmünket a kezedbe helyezzük
kellemes légkörben fogadunk
Banki ügyfelünk tapasztalt felhős infrastruktúra rendszermérnököt keres, aki a technológiák bevezetésében, folyamatok, biztonsági irányelvek kialakításában, alkalmazások migrálásában támogatná az üzemeltetési csapatot.
Feladatok:
együttműködés az üzleti, üzemeltetési és fejlesztői csapatokkal a megfelelő megoldás megtalálásában
új folyamatok kialakítása, meglévő rendszerek és folyamatok fejlesztése
a csapatok képzése a legújabb felhős technológiákkal és trendekkel kapcsolatban
jó gyakorlatok ismerete és alkalmazása a mindennapi munkában
hibák azonosítása és megoldása, illetve ezek koordinálása
kapcsolattartás a nemzetközi csapatokkal 
Elvárások:
felsőfokú végzettség informatikai/mérnöki területen
Azure és/vagy AWS minősítések
legalább 2 éves felhős technológiai tapasztalat AWS technológiában
üzemeltetési vagy rendszerintegrációs tapasztalat
tapasztalat, részvétel stratégia kialakításában
analitikai képességek, rendszerszemlélet
jó kommunikációs és együttműködési képességek
angol nyelv tárgyalási szintű ismerete (szóban és írásban)
önálló munkavégzésre való alkalmasság
Előny:
banki tapasztalat
Amit kínálunk:
szakmailag felkészült nemzetközi csapat
szakmai képzések
Home Office lehetőség
csapatépítő rendezvények
cafeteria csomag
Hogy zajlik nálunk a kiválasztási folyamat?Miután megkaptuk a jelentkezésed, telefonon keresünk, röviden ismertetjük, milyen pozíciót/pozíciókat tudunk számodra ajánlani szakmai tapasztalatod alapján.Ha szimpatikus számodra az általunk kínált lehetőség, egyeztetünk egy időpontot, és részletesebben is elbeszélgetünk karrierterveidről egy online interjú keretében. A kiválasztási folyamat során a pozícióért felelős toborzóval tartod a kapcsolatot, aki folyamatosan informál majd az egyes lépésekről.
Tanácsadónk továbbítja jelentkezésed az ügyfelünk számára.Ügyfeleinknél maximum 2 körös, HR és szakmai interjúra számíthatsz, ahol részletesen mesélnek neked a cégről, pozícióról, projektről, juttatásokról.Az interjúk után mindig adunk visszajelzést.A folyamat a kölcsönös pozitív visszajelzések függvényében egy írásbeli ajánlattétellel zárul, melyet szerződéskötés követ, aminek veled együtt örülünk.A "Jelentkezem" gomb megnyomásával, bérigény megjelölésével várjuk a pályázati anyagodat. Bátran jelentkezz, még ha nem is mindenben felelsz meg az állásajánlatban leírtaknak!További információért keress minket: IT@getwork.hu .Köszönjük a jelentkezésedet! Nálunk Te vagy a legfontosabb!munkaerő-közvetítés engedély száma 10097-1/2012-0100-848
